problem_names:
lemma match_ex_table_SomeD:
  "match_ex_table P C pc xt = Some (pc',d') \<Longrightarrow> 
  \<exists>(f,t,D,h,d) \<in> set xt. matches_ex_entry P C pc (f,t,D,h,d) \<and> h = pc' \<and> d=d'"
translations:
lemma match_ex_table_SomeD:
  "match_ex_table P C pc xt = Some (pc',d') \<Longrightarrow> 
  \<exists>(f,t,D,h,d) \<in> set xt. matches_ex_entry P C pc (f,t,D,h,d) \<and> h = pc' \<and> d=d'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. match_ex_table P C pc xt = \<lfloor>(pc', d')\<rfloor> \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>(f, t, D, h, d)\<in>set xt.
       matches_ex_entry P C pc (f, t, D, h, d) \<and> h = pc' \<and> d = d'
